Medium: Faience; globular, melon-shaped body with loop handle, straight spout and cover surmounted by a knob; light clay covered with an unctuous crackled cream-colored glaze; decorated with diapered borders and sprays of chrysanthemums in gold, red and blue enamels (Satsuma ware)
Credit Line: Gift of Mrs. George A. Crocker (Elizabeth Masten), 1937
